title: The biggest 3 things that golang should do first. #14461
body:
android/ios
bigdata
GUI

I think these 3 things should have the highest priority.
If golang doesn't notice this, it will lost the time.

java is slow, fat and complex, but why java is the top 1 programming language for a dozen years ?
that is java satisfy the requirement of time. Java is lucky and a legend.

If golang wants to be a legend too, it must resolve the requirement of android/ios, bigdata, GUI developing first.
